question_text:
Question 8
P invested 5000 per month for 6 months of a year and Q invested 
x 
per month for 8 month of the year in 
a partnership business. The profit is shared in proportion to the total investment made in that year. If at
the end of that investment year, Q receives 
4
9
 
 of the total profit, what is the value of x (in 
Rs.
).
(A) 8437 
 
 
(B) 3000
(C) 2500 
 
 
(D) 4687
